parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math - Geometry

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks for intersection of terrain between two ASL positions. Returns [[true]] if intersects with terrain.
For AGL variant, see [[terrainIntersect]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[terrainIntersectASL]] [pos1, pos2]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [pos1, pos2]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pos1: [[Array]] - start position in format [[PositionASL]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> pos2: [[Array]] - end position in format [[PositionASL]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_intersects = [[terrainIntersectASL]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[getPosASL]] [[player]], [[getPosASL]] chopper];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_intersects = [[terrainIntersectASL]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[eyePos]] [[player]], [[eyePos]] enemy1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[terrainIntersectAtASL]], [[lineIntersectsSurfaces]], [[intersect]], [[lineIntersects]], [[lineIntersectsWith]], [[terrainIntersect]], [[lineIntersectsObjs]], [[checkVisibility]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on may 31, 2012 - 10:40 (CEST)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Lou Montana|Lou Montana]]</dt>
<dd class="note">Please note the difference :
* terrainIntersect
* terrainIntersectASL
* lineIntersect'''''s'''''
* lineIntersect'''''s'''''With
* lineIntersect'''''s'''''Objs 
* intersect

<dd class="notedate">Posted on may 31, 2012 - 10:40 (CEST)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Rocket|Rocket]]</dt>
<dd class="note">This command is CPU intensive on the engine, be careful with its use.

<dd class="notedate">Posted on March 2, 2019 - 20:29 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:bloodwyn1756|bloodwyn1756]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
If one of the two positions is below sea level, the command always returns true.
</dd>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
